comment: I enjoyed Prof. Perrys class. You can tell she is very passionate about dance and very informative. There will be a lot of discussion posts and responses to peers. She gives great feedback to every assignment and responds to emails in a timely manner.
Her knowledge and enthusiasm for the subject really shows

There was a book she wanted us to get but never used it so dont waste ur $. you can download for free online too. Overall easy. You have little discussions, 2 quizzes, easy writing assignments, and like 3 or 4 exams. I made an A on every discussion/ writing assignment. Tests were challenging for me but not too bad. Uses lockdown browser/no webcam.

This was an online class that I had to do 100 things for outside of class meaning attend dance performance and dance classes for. This is the only online class that I've ever had to work this hard for. She also only responded to certain emails and her tests were hard. Don't recommend her unless you really love dance
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: For an online class, there was so much work to do. 2 required concerts and tickets are $15 each, 3 group projects, 3 discussion posts, 2 tests, 2 quizzes, and a final (Im probably missing something). This didnt feel like an intro class at all  it felt like I was a dancing major. Good luck if you want to take her

Registration claims the class is 100% online if that were the case she shouldn't be allowed to require attendance for outside events. I took an online class so that I could work at my pace because I have other responsibilities. However, group projects and 4 mandatory in-person outside assignments make this class 70% online. Prof is an okay teacher.

This class was an online class, however, there were many required assignments outside of the class. You pay to go to dance performances and galleries, that are required. The textbook was required but not used. All test are screen recorded. She thinks that everyone grew up dancing. All other grades are group projects. Pray you get a good group.

Even though it was a big class, the subjects we talked about were fun and interesting. She was open to lots of different points of view and was helpful and nice. I especially liked how she included the two guys from Africa in discussions. I learned a lot about how important dance is their culture.

She was very knowledgeable and enthusiastic. She gave thorough reviews of what would be on each exam, and study guides were posted. Very little required reading. Her class on dance criticism right before we saw the concert made me see dance in a whole new light.

She was well organized and had all the notes online which were accessible for students. The test were easy which I'm happy that they were.She's a very nice lady and you could tell she loves what she does. I was very interested in what was taught and loved the guest speakers who came in.

Doesn't understand that most students didn't grow up dancing ballet (or perhaps anything else) & that referencing specific techniques is unhelpful when no one knows what they are. Tries to be helpful, but is spacey. All texts, quizzes, & tests online. Attendance of 1 gallery viewing and KSU dance performance required. Mandatory attendance policy.

EASIEST CLASS EVER!!! All notes, powerpoints, study guides are online! Tests are online and open to everything. Simply go to class and have your notes out when taking the test and you WILL HAVE AN A! However, she is the most BORING teacher ever so plan on this being nap time.

This is the easiest class ever!!! you will def get an A even if you do not try all answers are online and no book is necessary it is online. this class will bore you to death, when you get a guest speaker it will be great! theater is very cold...take her you will get an A attendance is mandatory though, tons of xtra credit but was usually $$$.

EXTREMELY easy class, but lectures were so boring that I spent them writing "Help me" on my notes.  You won't learn much, or see any actual dance.  Guest speakers were cool.  Sweet professor, but she would make a better high school teacher.  The easiest class EVER.

This is a very easy class. All notes, powerpoints and readings are posted online and available for use during quizzes and tests. The teacher, however, is a bit unorganized and annoying. I felt as if she didn't know the material that she was teaching. I am a dance major and she made me dislike dance, if that says anything.

Very easy class, all of the notes and powerpoints are posted online and are available to use during quizzes/tests. All reading is posted online. I don't like the teacher, simply because she is over dramatic about unimportant things and is annoying. I am a dance major and she made me dislike dance. The class is an easy A, though.

This is one of the easiest classes I'v ever taken. All of the info. you need for the (online) quizzes and exams are in power-point form (online.) The only thing is attendance is mandatory, the theater is very cold, and the lectures are quite repetitive/boring. I really liked when she had guest speakers come in, they were always interesting.

She is an over-all nice person, but her class is BORING!! It is literally an hour and 15 minute monologue lecture. This class really could and should be an online class - all of her powerpoints and notes are online during tests and quizzes. However attendance is mandatory - only thing that keeps people in their seats during class.

All tests and quizzes are online and straight from her notes on GAview so its an easy A. The worst part about this class was that attendance is mandatory. I could never have gone and still gotten an A. The class is super boring and the theater is VERY cold.  Perry is nice but very VERY boring. My best advice is to bring a blanket and take a nap.

This is one of  the worst classes I have ever taken.  I only took this class so that I could get an easy A.  This teacher made me feel like I was a 5 year old the entire semester.  She can be very rude and condescending.  Unorganized, to much information.  It was to much work for a gen ed class.  I did make an A, but it was way to hard! Dont take!!

DO NOT TAKE CLASS!! both teachers are awful!! tests have over 300 slides of notes that are extremely specific without a study guide. they expect everyone to know everything about dance. guidelines are not specific! take any other class! not this one!!

DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS! She is the worst teacher. If you absolutly have to take this class take Berry. You are lucky to get a c in this class. You feel like your in a dance major. Take art music or theatre. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS
